report.title: Get my square that have plots
report.description: Get a list of core Squares and additional squares that have been assigned to the user and also have at least one plot assigned to the square.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=square.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=square.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id JOIN users u on u.id=#current_user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=square.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.deleted=false WHERE (square.location_type_id=#core_square_location_type_id# OR square.location_type_id=#additional_square_location_type_id#) AND #website_filter# AND square.deleted=false

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.
